doc.title: Frohes Fest, Lucie!
doc.plot: Lucie is afraid. Her neighbour at her house in the forest is frightening her in order to get her out of the house she loves so much. She consults the young lawyer Zygl, but Zygl is also employed by her aunt who wants him to sell the house. And what is the secret of Lucie's mother and her mysterious death?
